trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_collection_count.last(0)}>{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_collection_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more collections have been added

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_collection_count.last(0)}<{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_collection_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more collections have been dropped

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:db_count.last(0)}>{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:db_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more databases have been created

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:db_count.last(0)}<{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:db_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more databases have been destroyed

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_index_count.last(0)}>{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_index_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more indexes have been added

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_index_count.last(0)}<{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:total_index_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more indexes have been dropped

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:replica_set_member_count.last(0)}>{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:replica_set_member_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more members have been added to the ReplicaSet

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:replica_set_member_count.last(0)}<{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:replica_set_member_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more members have been removed from the ReplicaSet

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:shard_chunk_count.last(0)}>{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:shard_chunk_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more new shard chunks have been created

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:sharded_collections_count.last(0)}>{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:sharded_collections_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more new sharded collections have been created
One or more replication members need attention

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:shard_count.last(0)}>{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:shard_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more shards have been added to the cluster

trigger.expression: {Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:shard_count.last(0)}<{Template App MongoDB For Moveon4 Servers Alternate:shard_count.last(1)}
trigger.name: One or more shards have been removed from the cluster
